title: Dream6.Start
body:
<<changeSceneObject SceneShotController opening>>
<<changeSceneShot SceneShotController shot1>>
Annabelle: ...
<<changeSceneShot SceneShotController shot2>>
Annabelle: ....
<<changeSceneObject SceneShotController emmaappears>>
<<changeSceneShot SceneShotController shot3>>
Annabelle: Emma? Is that you?
<<changeSceneObject SceneShotController closing>>
<<changeSceneShot SceneShotController shot5>>
Annabelle: Is that really you!?
Annabelle: ...
Annabelle: I'm sorry for running way
Annabelle: I'm sorry I left you, I've never forgiven myself
Annabelle: are you alive?
Annabelle: where are you?
<<changeSceneShot SceneShotController shot4>>
Annabelle: ...
Annabelle: can you speak?
Annabelle: can you even hear me?
Annabelle: ...
<<changeSceneShot SceneShotController shot6>>
Annabelle: If you're still alive, I'll find you
Annabelle: I'll set you free, I'll kill anyone who gets in my way
Annabelle: please tell me where you are
<<returnToCampScene DialogAndPortraitContainer>>
